response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would also bring significant benefits to you. Considering its worth to both parties, we propose a price of $900,000 for this transaction. We are confident that this offer presents a mutually beneficial arrangement and looks forward to discussing how this product could enhance your endeavors. Should you require any further information or have questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our proposal.", "product_price": 900000}
